page.title: 05WESTOE PIT
page.content: I am Lisa aged nine.I live near{Westoe {Pit}it is a very big coal mine.It stretches six miles out to sea.{Coal } {mining}is one of the biggest industries in the North East with its related services.The colliery employs over 2,300 men and produces 1.2 million tonnes of coal a year.My dad works there with my uncle and grandad.Last year the miners were on strike for 12 months. Westoe Pit has lots of coal reserves far out{under the North Sea.}The pit {is }1,333ft. deep.There are 30 coal cutting machines and Westoe is one of the most efficient mines in the country.Lots of money has been invested in the pit. The other local pits Harton and Marsden have closed in the last 20 years.Today the streets around the pit are cleaner due to the smokeless zone.
